alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dillon and northern Marion Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kemper to near Blue Brick. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Mullins, Lake View, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Gapway, Rains, Floydale, Smithboro, Kemper, and Nichols. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
